content: (Session resumed after context limit - continuing from Jan 2)
Completed adding navigation links to all learning docs. Committed and pushed cleanup changes.
Queue email in Gmail, ensure Luthien logs captured, move CSV to repo in dev/context/prompts_and_replies
Moved CSV to repo. Updated with recent entries. Explained Gmail schedule send.
Add Luthien onboarding to /learning folder. Offer setup call in email.
Created 06_OPTIONAL_LUTHIEN_SETUP.md. Updated email with 30-min setup call offer.
CSV only has Jan 2 data. Check Luthien for older logs.
Found Adrian session spans Dec 29 - Jan 2 (337 events). Creating separate CSV per day.
Created: 2025-12-29_family-testing.csv, 2026-01-01_game-creation.csv, renamed Jan 2 file
Clean up formatting: ¬øCu√°l should be ¿Cuál - is this a Luthien bug?
Not Luthien bug - UTF-8 displayed as Latin-1. Root cause: CSV without BOM. Added BOM to all CSV files.
Add encoding gotcha to gotchas.md, CLAUDE.md, and /build/CLAUDE.md
Added gotcha #20 with 5 whys analysis to all three files
Realized publishing CLAUDE.md is scope creep. Email Luis first, park website idea for later.
Will Claude Code read CLAUDE_PRIVATE.md?
No - but CLAUDE.local.md works! Auto-read + auto-gitignored. Perfect for public/private split.
GitHub doesn't preserve hyperlinks. Email too long. Shorten to 1-2 paragraphs.
Wrote short bilingual email with just link to GitHub learning folder
Updated repo with vFinal (email actually sent) + v1 (long version as reference)
Committed vFinal email to repo. Email sent to Luis!
Log convo to CSV. Create /build/TODO.md. Add history to /build/personal-site folder.
